node.title: Man charged with murder, another arrested, over shooting death of woman who answered her door
node.alt: an elderly woman in sunglasses smiling
node.description: A man has been charged with murder, and NSW Police are seeking the extradition of a second man, afterÂ Newcastle woman Stacey Klimovitch was shot dead at her front door almost six months ago.
node.content:
["A man has been charged with murder, and another arrested,\u00a0over the shooting\u00a0death\u00a0of a Newcastle woman\u00a0almost six months ago.", "Stacey Klimovitch, 61, was shot dead when she answered a knock at the front door of her Stockton home on June 9.", "Strike Force Backhouse was set up to investigate her murder.", "On Friday, detectives\u00a0arrested Stuart Daniel Campbell, 29, in Newcastle and he was later charged with murder.", "With assistance from the Australian Federal Police, Jason Hawkins, 46, was arrested in the ACT on Friday\u00a0night.", "He was taken to a local police station where a NSW warrant was issued.", "Mr Campbell's case was briefly mentioned in Newcastle bail court this morning.", "He didn't apply for bail and it was formally refused.", "The matter was adjourned for eight weeks to allow a brief of evidence to be prepared.", "In the ACT Magistrates Court, Mr Hawkins applied for bail, but the application was put off until Monday when NSW Police will seek his extradition.", "Mr Hawkins told the court he knew the matter was about murder, but there wasn't a statement of facts.", "\"I don't understand what is happening,\" he said.", "", "
Ms Klimovitch was shot in the chest when she answered the door at her Stockton home on June 9.(ABC News: Ben Millington)
"]
